医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
具有机械弹性的癌细胞更容易转移癌细胞转移或从身体的一个部位扩散到另一个部位的能力是癌症治疗极具挑战性的原因之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Mechanoresilient-cancer-cells-more-prone-to-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Mechanoresilient-cancer-cells-more-prone-to-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bf0c51e-360a-4c0e-b777-a8d659620df2 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 22:14:42 -0400 Mechanoresilient cancer cells more prone to metastasis
研究人员确定了参与多发性硬化症病变发生的关键调节因子通过 CRISPR 筛选，慕尼黑大学研究人员首次提供了 T 细胞浸润多发性硬化症患者中枢神经系统的全面分子特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Researchers-identify-key-regulators-involved-in-genesis-of-multiple-sclerosis-lesions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Researchers-identify-key-regulators-involved-in-genesis-of-multiple-sclerosis-lesions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42837944-2cc1-4c8c-b7b6-cb0d72518256 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 22:00:08 -0400 Researchers identify key regulators involved in genesis of multiple sclerosis lesions
机器学习将虚拟药物筛选速度提高了 10 倍通过机器学习促进虚拟筛选，将 15.6 亿个药物样分子的处理时间缩短了 10 倍。东芬兰大学的研究人员与工业界和超级计算机合作，进行了世界上最大的虚拟药物筛查之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Machine-learning-speeds-up-virtual-drug-screening-by-10-fold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Machine-learning-speeds-up-virtual-drug-screening-by-10-fold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22071a17-ce0d-4d2e-a837-94a24aa1fe64 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 21:52:42 -0400 Machine learning speeds up virtual drug screening by 10-fold
母亲和后代之间的细胞串扰比预期更复杂几十年来，科学家们已经知道，怀孕需要母亲的身体进行调整，这样她的免疫系统就不会像攻击敌对的外来入侵者一样攻击正在成长的胎儿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Cellular-crosstalk- Between-mother-and-offspring-is-more-complex-than-expected.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Cellular-crosstalk- Between-mother-and-offspring-is-more-complex-than-expected.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60e74ab4-87bd-4f24-b6e0-9b56c950853e Fri, 22 Sep 2023 21:41:28 -0400 Cellular crosstalk between mother and offspring is more complex than expected
蛋白质降解分子机制的新见解在细胞内部复杂的分子景观中，蛋白质的编排需要精确的控制以避免疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-insights-into-the-molecular-mechanism-of- Protein-degradation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-insights-into-the-molecular-mechanism-of- Protein-degradation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a94325a-8cb5-499d-824f-95bca70b1ed2 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 21:35:23 -0400 New insights into the molecular mechanism of protein degradation
研究人员从 NIH 获得 120 万美元用于扩展和完善机器人眼科检查伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校和杜克大学的研究人员合作开发了一种机器人眼科检查系统，美国国立卫生研究院授予研究人员 120 万美元用于扩展和完善该系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Researchers-receive-2412-million-from-NIH-to-expand-and-refine-the-robotic-eye-examination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Researchers-receive-2412-million-from-NIH-to-expand-and-refine-the-robotic-eye-examination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf1c6daf-963c-4540-83a9-3d491093afe9 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 18:53:00 -0400 Researchers receive $1.2 million from NIH to expand and refine the robotic eye examination
针对中线神经胶质瘤 H3K27M 突变的肽疫苗在早期试验中显示出希望肿瘤疫苗可以帮助身体对抗癌症。这些疫苗会提醒患者的免疫系统注意携带癌症典型改变的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Peptide-vaccine-targets-H3K27M-mutation-in-midline-gliomas-shows-promise-in-early-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Peptide-vaccine-targets-H3K27M-mutation-in-midline-gliomas-shows-promise-in-early-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=511c5443-97a0-44eb-83f5-962d4ba36409 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 18:09:15 -0400 Peptide vaccine targets H3K27M mutation in midline gliomas, shows promise in early trials
社会关系可以缓冲负面童年经历对脆弱的影响虚弱是晚年成年人的一个严重问题，因为它与额外的健康风险有关，包括残疾、跌倒、住院和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Social-relationships-buffer-the-effects-of-negative-childhood-experiences-on-frailty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Social-relationships-buffer-the-effects-of-negative-childhood-experiences-on-frailty.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3188778-897f-496d-9b7d-caef7ef9d032 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:52:46 -0400 Social relationships buffer the effects of negative childhood experiences on frailty
新抗癌治疗技术靶向癌细胞溶酶体并克服耐药性UNIST 化学系的 Ja-Hyoung Ryu 教授和他的研究团队开发了一种突破性的抗癌治疗技术，选择性地靶向癌细胞溶酶体并克服耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-anticancer-treatment-technology-targets-cancer-cell-lysosomes-and-overcomes-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-anticancer-treatment-technology-targets-cancer-cell-lysosomes-and-overcomes-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92e46af9-baf4-424e-bd5a-3ca71341329c Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:37:33 -0400 New anticancer treatment technology targets cancer cell lysosomes and overcomes drug resistance
研究提供了对人类 8 细胞样细胞和早期胚胎发育的见解胚胎特异性基因转录的开始，也称为胚胎基因组激活（EGA），是生物体发育过程中的关键一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Study-provides-insights-into- human-8-cell-like-cells-and-early-embryonic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Study-provides-insights-into- human-8-cell-like-cells-and-early-embryonic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9407a5f0-eccc-4792-b2d3-a47018cd9cf7 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:23:45 -0400 Study provides insights into human 8-cell-like cells and early embryonic development
